response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your business endeavors. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value of $1,500,000, providing you with a substantial return on investment.

The product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will bring immense benefits to your operations. By accepting this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from a competitive edge in your industry.

Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of working together to achieve mutual success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
